summary: Completed backend API testing (100% success) but frontend is completely broken due to babel compilation errors. Backend APIs are fully functional including admin auth, dashboard stats, parent/camper management, kanban board, billing, and parent portal access. Frontend has critical compilation issues preventing any UI from loading.

critical_compilation_errors.issue: Maximum call stack size exceeded - infinite recursion between getArrayIterationContext and analyzeMemberExpression functions
critical_compilation_errors.impact: Frontend completely fails to compile and load - no UI accessible
critical_compilation_errors.symptoms: Webpack compilation fails, React app doesn't start, browser shows compilation error page

passed_tests: Kanban board functionality and status updates
All additional endpoints (parents, campers, invoices, communications, rooms, financial, exports)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend babel compilation error in /app/frontend/plugins/visual-edits/babel-metadata-plugin.js. The infinite recursion between getArrayIterationContext and analyzeMemberExpression functions is preventing the entire React app from compiling. This must be resolved before any frontend testing can proceed. Consider removing or fixing the problematic babel plugin.
